events.py¶

job_monitoring_app.backend.app.services.events.create_event(db: Session, event: EventCreatePublic, provider: User) → Event¶

Create an event for a study

Args:

db (Session): SQLAlchemy session event (schemas.EventCreatePublic): Event to create provider: Provider

Returns:

models.Event: Created event

job_monitoring_app.backend.app.services.events.get_event_by_id(db: Session, event_id: int) → Event¶

Get event by id from the database

Args:

db (Session): SQLAlchemy session event_id (int): Event id (primary key)

Returns:

models.Event: Event

job_monitoring_app.backend.app.services.events.update_event(db: Session, event: EventUpdate) → Event¶

Update an event in the database This function takes an eventUpdate schema consisting of the event id, new status, and new metadata and updates the corresponding event in the database. This is called when an orthanc_data_logging agent updates an event that is part of an ongoing study

Args:

db (Session): SQLAlchemy session event (schemas.EventUpdate): Event to update

returns:

models.Event: The Updated event
